districtOffices.title: District Offices
districtOffices.description: Our district offices serve as the primary contact points for youth services, program registration, and community support across Sri Lanka.
districtOffices.listDescription: Find your nearest district office for assistance with NYSC programs and services

trainingCenters.title: Training Centers
trainingCenters.description: Our training centers offer comprehensive vocational and skills development programs to empower Sri Lankan youth.
trainingCenters.listDescription: Discover our training centers offering various skill development programs

youthCenters.title: Youth Centers
youthCenters.description: Community-based centers providing recreational, educational, and cultural activities for young people across Sri Lanka.
youthCenters.listDescription: Find youth centers offering activities and programs in your area

centerLocator.title: Center Locator
centerLocator.description: Find the nearest NYSC centers and offices based on your location and requirements.
centerLocator.resultsDescription: Centers within your selected area and criteria
centerLocator.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or location
